title: microwave acorn squash curry
instructions: Add squash, water, oil, and a pinch of salt to a microwaveable steaming container.
Cook on full power (1200W) for 5 minutes.
Mix, then cook on high for another 5 minutes. Optionally, add garam masala at this stage.
Add garlic, spices, and syrup, then cook for another 2 minutes.
Optionally, add cherry tomatoes with a small pinch of salt and a splash of water, then cook for 5 minutes, stirring once.
Optionally, add frozen peas and cook for another 3â€“5 minutes.
Adjust salt or curry powder as needed.
